Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Aeropuerto Sur in Granadilla de Abona (San Isidro), you'll be close to El Medano Beach and Montana Roja. This hotel is within the vicinity of La Tejita Beach and Golf del Sur.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 77 individually decorated guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access and barbecue grills.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Aeropuerto Sur. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Planning an event in Granadilla de Abona? This hotel features 1991 square feet (185 square meters) of event facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Aeropuerto Sur. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

El Medano Beach - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Montana Roja - 4 km / 2.5 mi
La Tejita Beach - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Golf del Sur - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
San Miguel Castle - 7 km / 4.4 mi
Iglesia de San Antonio Abad of Arona - 12.6 km / 7.8 mi
Golf Los Palos - 12.8 km / 7.9 mi
Camel Park - 13 km / 8 mi
Golf Las Americas - 16 km / 10 mi
Los Cristianos Beach - 16.2 km / 10 mi
Magma Art and Congress Centre - 16.8 km / 10.4 mi
Siam Park - 16.8 km / 10.4 mi
Aqualand Costa Adeje - 16.9 km / 10.5 mi
Gran Sur Shopping Center - 16.9 km / 10.5 mi
Teide National Park - 17.3 km / 10.7 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Aeropuerto Sur is Tenerife (TFS-Tenerife South) - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
